titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell, Receipt Louisville & Nashville Railroad Company
CWG13733

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; 1863 Office Expenses - Telegraph, Stationary - Transportation - Ordinance Stores; Bundle 5

body.p:
NO. 22.
The United States, State of Ky
To LOUISVILLE & NASHVILLE RAILROAD COMPANY, Dr
1862 For Transportation as follows Viz Mileage Total Mileage Rate Amount
December. 3 Men from Louisville to Elizabethtown Ky 42.4 127 2
" T. C. Kennedy " " " Russellville " 143.3 143 3
" Capt Hacker " Brooks Station " Elizabethtown " 29.1 29 1
" Capt Hacker " Elizabethtown " Brooks Station " 291 29 1
" Lieut John. E. Enlow & wife
" From Elizabethtown To Louisville Ky 424 84 8
" Capt P. Hacker. From Elizabethtown To Louisville " " 42 4
" Capt D. A. Harvey " Lebanon " " " 67. 67.
522. 9 c 2¢ $10 46
Add 3 per¢ Govt. Tax. as authorized by Q. M. Genl in Circular dated Nov 14th 1862.
31
$10 77

Approved
By order of the Governor
Jno. W Finnell
Adt Genl Ky Vols
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the Public Service.
Received at Frankfort Ky the 18 of April 18623., of Jno W Finnell Adj. Genl. Ky Volunteers Quartermaster U.S. Army, the sum of Ten Dollars, and Seventy seven cents, in full of the above account.

No. 22.
No. 158 Abstract B P Qr. 1862.
Lou & Nash R R co
Dollars $10 77/100
Paid April 18th 18623.
